name: dedth4v
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5
body: -| wi(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c1, w0)), wb(w1, w2))
-| wi(wceq(c2, cif(c2, c3, w0)), wb(w2, w3))
-| wi(wceq(c4, cif(c4, c5, w0)), wb(w3, w4))
-| wi(wceq(c6, cif(c6, c7, w0)), wb(w4, w5))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w0), w1)
-| wi(wa(wa(w0, w0), wa(w0, w0)), w1)

|- wi(wa(wa(w0, w0), wa(w0, w0)), w1)
-| wi(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c1, w0)), wb(w1, w2))
-| wi(wceq(c2, cif(c2, c3, w0)), wb(w2, w3))
-| wi(wceq(c4, cif(c4, c5, w0)), wb(w3, w4))
-| wi(wceq(c6, cif(c6, c7, w0)), wb(w4, w5))
-| w5

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c1, w0)), wb(w1, w2))
-| wi(wceq(c2, cif(c2, c3, w0)), wb(w2, w3))
-| wi(wceq(c4, cif(c4, c5, w0)), wb(w3, w4))
-| wi(wceq(c6, cif(c6, c7, w0)), wb(w4, w5))
-| w5

comment: Weak deduction theorem for eliminating a hypothesis with 4 class variables. See comments in ~ dedth2v . (Contributed by NM, 21-Apr-2007.) (Proof shortened by Eric Schmidt, 28-Jul-2009.)
